messages.content:
You are a resume extraction and hiring-analysis AI. You must return ONE valid JSON object only. No explanations. No markdown. ==================== ABSOLUTE RULES ==================== - Output STRICT JSON only. - Never hallucinate data. - Never infer skills, years, or seniority from job titles alone. - If data is not explicitly present in the resume, use null or []. - Keep structured data and analysis fully consistent. - This output will be parsed automatically (batch-safe). - You MAY use external knowledge or industry standards to evaluate fit, but NEVER add or imply resume facts that are not explicitly present. ==================== OPTIONAL JOB AI STRATEGY CONTEXT ==================== No custom job AI strategy provided. ==================== JOB CONTEXT (treat as hiring constraints) ==================== Role Title: fullstack developer Minimum Seniority: senior Employment Type: full_time Industry: technology Location Preference: England, europe REQUIRED TECHNICAL SKILLS (must-have): - typescript SOFT SKILLS (preferred): - communication - leadership LANGUAGE REQUIREMENTS: - "english" CERTIFICATIONS (preferred): - Not specified EXPLICIT REQUIREMENTS:

Requirements

  • Extensive experience as a Senior Fullstack Developer delivering production-grade web applications in a technology environment.
  • Strong proficiency with modern JavaScript/TypeScript and a leading frontend framework (e.g., React, Vue, Angular).
  • Strong backend engineering skills with one or more of Node.js, Python, Java, or .NET, including API design (REST/GraphQL) and service integration.
  • Solid understanding of system design, scalability, performance optimization, and secure coding practices.
  • Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL/MySQL and MongoDB/Redis), including schema design and query optimisation.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP), containerisation (Docker), and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong testing discipline across unit, integration, and end-to-end testing; familiarity with automated quality gates.
  • Experience working with microservices and/or event-driven architectures; familiarity with messaging/streaming tools is beneficial.
  • Comfortable collaborating in a remote-first team across England/Europe time zones; excellent written and verbal communication.
  • Proven ability to lead technical decisions, mentor engineers, and drive delivery in an agile environment.
  • Strong product mindset with the ability to translate requirements into robust technical solutions.
==================== ADAPTIVE JOB ANALYSIS GUIDELINES ==================== 1️⃣ **Identify Job Type and Priorities**: - **Technical Roles**: Prioritize technical skills, hands-on experience, and project work. Reduce weight on academic certifications unless required. - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: Emphasize communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Minimize the emphasis on technical skills and projects. - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: Focus on educational qualifications and professional certifications. Minimize the emphasis on projects unless they are relevant. 2️⃣ **Research and Context**: - Utilize industry best practices and standards for the specific job type. - Identify what HR professionals prioritize in each role type to ensure that the analysis is aligned with real-world hiring practices. 3️⃣ **Comprehensive Resume Analysis**: - Extract resume details and provide a contextual analysis based on the job type. - Offer insights into what makes a candidate suitable or less suitable for the role, considering the job’s unique requirements. ==================== ADAPTIVE SCORING MODEL ==================== - **Technical Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 50 - Experience Impact: 20 - Projects and Initiative: 15 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 20 - Soft Skills: 40 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 15 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 40 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) Mapping: - score < 50 → not_recommended - 50–69 → consider - ≥ 70 → highly_recommended ==================== OUTPUT SCHEMA ==================== { "structured": { "name": string | null, "contact": { "email": string | null, "phone": string | null, "linkedin": string | null, "github": string | null, "portfolio": string | null }, "location": { "city": string | null, "country": string | null }, "current_title": string | null, "total_experience_years": number | null, "education": [ { "degree": string | null, "institution": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "experience": [ { "title": string | null, "company": string | null, "start_year": number | null, "end_year": number | "Present" | null, "highlights": [string] } ], "skills": [string], "tools": [string], "certifications": [ { "name": string | null, "issuer": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "languages": [string], "projects": [ { "name": string | null, "description": string | null, "tech": [string] } ] }, "analysis": { "score": number, "score_breakdown": { "role_fit_and_core_skills": number, "experience_impact": number, "performance_productivity": number, "retention_engagement_indicators": number, "leadership_collaboration": number, "education_certifications": number, "projects_initiative": number }, "seniorityLevel": string, "recommendation": "not_recommended" | "consider" | "recommended" | "highly_recommended", "insights": { "strengths": [string], "weaknesses": [string] } }, "ai_insights": { "matched_job_titles": [string], "ai_thought": string, "suggested_next_roles": [string] } } ==================== FINAL TASK ==================== 1. Extract structured resume data. 2. Analyze job nature and requirements. 3. Score resume based on adaptive criteria. 4. Provide insights 5. Produce recommendation. 6. Return exactly one valid JSON object.

Resume:
GHADA HAMDY
SKILLS
SUMMARY
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Business Administration
WORK EXPERIENCE
Co-founder , Kaisce
Madinaty,Cairo - +201141696377
Ghada.hamdy2003.com
University of Arab academy for science, technology and maritime transport AAST
Specialization in Marketing.
Grade : Excellent with Honors “3.8”
Oct 2021 - Jun 2025
Energetic and ambitious Business Administration graduate with proven entrepreneurial experience as
the founder of a successful beauty brand, launched and managed while completing university studies.
Skilled in business planning, marketing, and customer relationship management, with a strong passion
for innovation and delivering high-quality products. Demonstrates a proactive mindset, adaptability, and
the ability to balance multiple responsibilities effectively.
Feb 2022 - Present
Developed and executed business strategies covering product design, branding, pricing, and sales.
Led marketing campaigns across social media platforms, increasing brand awareness and
generating consistent customer engagement.
Managed supplier relationships, inventory control, and quality assurance to ensure timely product
delivery.
Photographer , Musk
Developed creative mood boards to establish and align visual direction with the company’s brand identity.
Produced photo and video content that directly supported marketing campaigns and contributed to
increased sales.
Delivered high-quality content under tight deadlines, demonstrating strong adaptability and efficiency in fastpaced environments.
-Business Strategy & Planning
-Branding & Product Development Digital Marketing (Social Media and Content Creation)
-Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
-Market Research & Competitive Analysis Sales & Negotiation
-Skills Team Leadership & Collaboration
-Skill in Editing Adobe Photoshop,Lightroom and Premiere Pro
Aug 2025 - present
-- 1 of 1 --

Egypt

In result of passing the exam, a certificate was acquired for achieving completion of

experience that was earned.

Graduation Project 1 & 2
AAST

Marketing Plan, Goals & Objectives, Problem Statement, Vision & Mission, Gantt

Android Mobile Application
AAST

built an Android shopping app.

languages.

plan.

-Assigned tasks to employees and created reports tracking employees' progress.
-Managed finance and payroll of employees and estimated budget of the company.
-Mastered the use of Microsoft Project after navigating hurdles and its difficulties.
Website Development & Design
AAST.
-Collaborated with teammates and programmed the website using PHP and CSS.
12/2021 - 01/2022
-Designed multiple pages smoothly within the website, including: Products page,
Contact us page, Footer.
-Incorporated the use of SQL and converted data on the site into an organized
database.
-Defined and illustrated the project details and conveyed them in a presentable
format.
-Amplified the project and demonstrated it using impressive presentation skills to
supervisors.
-Outperformed classmates and was awarded an "outstanding project" within the BIS
major for the remarkable work.
Certificates

Network Associate)
